title: Luke Dunivant Endowed Scholarship Fund
description: To provide scholarships in the School of Education at the University of Colorado Boulder. Recipient should be in a graduate level program and preference is for students who intend to become secondary social studies or psychology teachers.
marketingContent: To provide scholarships in the School of Education at the University of Colorado Boulder. Recipient should be in a graduate level program and preference is for students who intend to become secondary social studies or psychology teachers.
